content: Lots of good points about detaching ourselves and our egos from the code we write. This article also served as a reminder that when doing code reviews for others on the team it’s vital that we use tact and empathy when giving feedback or pointing out fixes/issues in others’ code! If people haven’t yet learned to detach themselves from their code, then doing code reviews too harshly or bluntly can result in hurt feelings and a less-than-ideal team dynamic. So, thanks for the reminders!
